name: Ghost Fight
description:
GHOST FIGHT

This is as 2 player battle game.
You are a ghost trying to hold on to our world.
You must fight for... Your life?
You have 20 seconds of spirit energy.
If you run out of spirit energy, you lose.
You have possession energy to posses objects.
If you posses an object your spirit energy 
will stop being consumed.
You can stay inside an object for 5 seconds or
else the object will kick you out.
You can't posses the last object that you did.
The last to survive is the winner.

Made for the Godot Wild Jam #7, with the Possession theme.

Credits: Leo Castanho e Marione Oliveira
